The Digital Portfolio Project was conceived with the purpose of offering a comprehensive view of the key milestones in my career as a programmer.

about.aboutMe: I am a Full Stack Systems Analyst and Developer with expertise in Typescript, Next.js, and React Native, also proficient in Python. I highlight my experience in creating automation for banking processes for Corbans, working on challenging projects for various banks. Additionally, I am the main developer of the Smart Signature app, available on the App Store and Play Store. My approach, focused on easy learning, adaptability to changes, and a constant pursuit of professional development, defines my profile. I am open to opportunities that offer growth and stimulating challenges.

list.title: Efficient Automation: Proposal Bureau
list.subTitle: Development of the Bureau and Integration of RPAs for Proposal Release Optimization
list.content:
As the team leader, I was strategically tasked with directing the design and implementation of the Proposal Bureau, a revolutionary solution that fully automates the credit release process. The original proposal came from the company's central vision, but I highlight my crucial role in the automation architecture, where I presented an innovative approach. Under my leadership, we successfully developed and delivered the project, including the creation of Robotic Process Automations (RPAs) for proposal search and approval operations. Additionally, we implemented a Bureau that classified imported operations based on the company's internal criteria, directing them for approval or rejection.

It's worth noting that this work was carried out as a service provider for the client Alcifmais, one of the largest banking correspondents in the consigned area in Brazil. My architectural proposal not only increased operational efficiency and reduced approval time but also optimized internal workflow, resulting in a significant improvement in the end-user experience.

list.title: Smart Signature
list.subTitle: Online legal app: consultancy, processes, contracts for Micro and Small Businesses.
list.content:
I played a crucial role in the design and implementation of an innovative online legal consulting app, in collaboration with my team at TriggerUp. Our work was essential for the successful launch of the app on both platforms, App Store and Play Store.

The system, targeted at Micro and Small Businesses, stands out for efficiency, dynamism, and accessibility. I led the creation of a digital environment allowing instant consultations with lawyers via messages, providing vital guidance for business development.

list.title: SigaCall
list.subTitle: Call System for Clinics and Offices
list.content: I developed an innovative TV application integrated with medical offices. The goal was to streamline patient calls, eliminating the need for dedicated staff. Divided into two components, the TV app announces the patient with configurable voice, while the web app allows professionals to manage calls and issue alerts in the corridors. I highlight the direct integration with medical systems, simplifying processes. This solution aims to optimize the patient flow and the experience in the clinical environment.
